abstract: Mark Oesterle, the chief counsel to Republicans on the Senate Banking Committee, has joined Reed Smith’s financial regulatory group in the law firm’s Washington office.
snippet: Mark Oesterle, the chief counsel to Republicans on the Senate Banking Committee, has joined Reed Smith’s financial regulatory group in the law firm’s Washington office.
lead_paragraph: Mark Oesterle, the chief counsel to Republicans on the Senate Banking Committee, has joined Reed Smith’s financial regulatory group in the law firm’s Washington office.

headline.main: Senate Banking Staffer Joins Reed Smith
